verses.roman:
se pratijñā bhaṅga haila gopīra bhajane
tāhāte pramāṇa kṛṣṇa-śrī-mukha-vacane

synonyms: se—that; pratijñā—promise; bhaṅga haila—was broken; gopīra—of the gopīs; bhajane—by the worship; tāhāte—in that; pramāṇa—the proof; kṛṣṇa—of Lord Kṛṣṇa; śrī-mukha-vacane—by the words from the mouth.
translation: That promise has been broken by the worship of the gopīs, as Lord Kṛṣṇa Himself admits.
